biography: Daisuke Yamanouchi is a porno director in Japan. He is mostly known for his AV works, such as Uzuku gibo to musume: Nekojita kurabe (2003); Muzan-e: AV gyaru satsujin bideo wa sonzai shita! (1999). Daisuke Yamanouchi also did one episode of TV mini-series called Furusato-Time in 2015. Active in TV. He also writes. He is most widely known for pornography(adult video). He was fired by Kyodo-TV due to violation of the contracts on the production of Furusato-Time.
name: Daisuke Yamanouchi
